quote: Sometimes Death lurks after them for days, weeks, or even months, waiting for their time... Sometimes it doesn’t, and I’ve often raced that omnipresent Reaper to one portion of its work.
quote_letters: SOMETIMES DEATH LURKS AFTER THEM FOR DAYS WEEKS OR EVEN MONTHS WAITING FOR THEIR TIME SOMETIMES IT DOESNT AND IVE OFTEN RACED THAT OMNIPRESENT REAPER TO ONE PORTION OF ITS WORK
